website_summaries.verdict: A basic stool with a stable design. A good pick for youngsters who need a boost to a sink or potty, or for adults who just need a little added height to lengthen their reach.
pros: Features an oval structure that is almost tip-proof
has protective rubber coating on top and bottom to guard against slips
Suitable for kids, but is sturdy enough for adults to use as well
cons: At approximately 6", it is fairly short and not suitable for consumers who need more height

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am short and I can't reach all the way into the bottom of my new supersize washing machine (don't laugh). This stool is perfect and didn't cost me close to a hundred dollars like the others. It's very light weight and small but it gets the job done for me. If you're looking for a wide tall stool this wouldn't be it but perfect for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: This stool is the best If you want something safe. Lite weight to move
customer_reviews.text: The cost was not the most important thing to me what was important is that it be safe. The stool is solid it’s not going to tip over and it’s easy to be moved from one spot to another. I have a condition with my balance and I have fallen getting out of bed and slipping off the sheets anyway this is going to keep me out of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and just the right height.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me. My new washing machine is so deep, I couldn’t reach the bottom. I had purchased a cheaper stool but it didn’t last. So I bought this one. I don’t like the stools with four legs because I inevitably kick one of the legs and hurt my toes. This one can even take my husband’s weight and he’s over 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: desertrat

customer_reviews.title: Great step stool-plenty wide & is sturdy,doesn’t wobble
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and not a “wimpy” stool. My husband has weakened upper body strength/hands due to early stages of ALS and he can pick it up. Perfect for him to reach shelves as he can’t lift his arms very high. Will help him continue to do things for himself which is important to him.
customer_reviews.author: LuvAmazon

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product that is Sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bough this step stool because of the high mattress that I now have. This step stool is a one piece construction so that you do not have to worry about it collapsing on you. Non-skid rubber covers the entire the top platform and the base is completely lined with non-skid rubber that gives it a solid footing. It will work great on a carpet or hard surface floor. The height is 6" so it is easy to step onto. Most important it supports weight up to 300 lbs.. Yes, 5 thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson to help with his potty training. It is so easy for him to carry around that he uses it for everything now. He helps his mom when she’s cooking and feels so good that he can see everything she’s doing. My granddaughter had one with two steps and that was dangerous as she couldn’t balance herself to turn around. This is great too because it doesn’t tip if they stand on one side. It really is a great step stool and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: barbwire

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool to help me get in and out of our boat, works like a charm. I wish I had gotten this 2 years earlier. I have bone on bone knee pain, and getting in and out of a boat was very painful and made me very self conscience trying to roll out of the boat. One step really makes the world of difference, Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fennessey

customer_reviews.title: Great all around stool
customer_reviews.text: Using it at work under the desk, not too large, can be moved easily, works for people of all heights, washable too. Not sure if it would be good for using to get something off a high shelf....not wide enough for balanced support.
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great little stool
customer_reviews.text: Great little stool. Using it to get into my high bed as I'm in the final stages of pregnancy and will be having a c section. Haven't had it long so not completely sure of the durability
customer_reviews.author: tmarie

customer_reviews.title: Light and small
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small stool to kick around the kitchen for high shelves and kids. I love the oval shape-it feels more space saving and less intrusive than the typical rectangle we've been working around.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not tip easily. Grippers are effective
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to not take up too much space, but big enough for our kids to stand on without falling off. Does not tip easily. Grippers are effective. Lightweight so my 3.5 year old can carry it wherever she wants (not sure if this is a pro or a con! Sneaky girl likes to get herself candy when I'm not paying attention!). Sturdy enough that I stand on it myself when I need to reach something on a shelf that's too high for me (5'2", 130 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to step in my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Nissan Xterra and since I fell and broke my lower lumbar disk, I found it hard to get in without hurting my back. This step up makes it easy for me to just slide in. It lives in the vehicle and I use it every time I go out.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Hakola

customer_reviews.title: Stable and sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my bedside. My bed is high and this is very sturdy and stable. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: hubcap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is light weight and stays in place very well. The height is just right for a short person.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Too small of a surface area
customer_reviews.text: I lije the height. I'm disabled and other step stools are just too tall fir me to step onto safely. However, there is only room for one of my size ten feet, as the oval shape only allows for one foot at a time. I guess i should order another one, as i need it to get into and out of bed, but my condition is already costing me more than i can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Great Boost
customer_reviews.text: I have a high bed and needed a little "step lift" This is perfect and I can also stand on it to reach things that are higher up, It is light weight and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work for my clients to make it easier to climb onto the massage table. It's very light so I'm able to swiftly move it back under the table with my foot when not in use. So far it's been sturdy and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: margarita s.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: But it does help you feel safe reaching for things out of reach. The husband has found he can go outside with it on the steps and use it for his feet to give himself a pedicure. I like to use it too when sitting in a counter height bar stool for my feet to rest on.
customer_reviews.author: Pennybinker

customer_reviews.title: This stool is very sturdy. It has rubber along the bottom so that ...
customer_reviews.text: This stool is very sturdy. It has rubber along the bottom so that is does not slide along the floor. It also has rubber on the stepping platform so it is not slippery. The package says it can hold up to 300lbs, so this is an item that is not just for kids. It is. It terribly tall, but just enough to give you a little elevation.
customer_reviews.author: The.VerdictTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Holds my 200+ weight. No sharp corners and doesn't move when I use it. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Useful for adults and children. Attractive too.
customer_reviews.text: Great height, light weight yet sturdy. Easy to clean. Got for myself to use inside for knee step-up exercises. Perfect size which stores right under a small tray table.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Black

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stool For Both Children and Adults
customer_reviews.text: This step tool is awesome. It is very sturdy without a lot of bulk. I liked it so much that I ordered an extra one. The grip top ensures that you don't slip off which I really like because I feel safe using it even with just socks on. This stool is basically the same size as the one step stools used for children to reach the sick. I would recommend any new parent to get this stool because it can be used by both children and adults.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMeale

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy little stool. I use it to get into bed. During the day I tuck it under the bed. It serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Shirnuf

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My mom needs a stool to reach up to the higher cabinets and this gets the job done. It's very light and it's stable.
customer_reviews.author: SRA

customer_reviews.title: Tough and can take a load
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 4 year old but is replacing the collapsable step stools that were quoted to carry up to 300lbs, so this needed to as well. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Kat J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Allowed me access into my tall bed and my tall SUV after surgery to repair severely broken leg. No slip rim on bottom and no slip surface on top.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get this step stool
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic, very strong, sturdy step stool. It will hold a full grown adult without issue. It gives that extra boost when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids bathroom !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this in her bathroom because she just isnt quite tall enough to reach anything. Very sturdy (for a child) for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Travels with mom are easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this some time ago to give my mom a little step up so she can get into my vehicle. She has a bad knee. Sturdy and a real help!
customer_reviews.author: maraj

customer_reviews.title: Nice for older person.
customer_reviews.text: Nice stool. My only complaint is I wish it was about 2 inches high. I am older and feel very safe on it and it is very light weight and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy hu

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i brought 3 and i love it very strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, lightweight, and easy to use. I feel secure standing on it, unlike so many other step stools
customer_reviews.author: Janice Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: My grandson uses this stool at the bathroom sink. He can easily move it around as it is lightweight. It is a sturdy stool and doesn't slip around on the tile floor. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: KR Grabenstetter

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & sturdy for Adults
customer_reviews.text: So handy. I am an adult and I like this because I don't have to lug out the mini ladder. It is lightweight and sturdy. One of my favorite purchases this year.
customer_reviews.author: Lcava2

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO MOVE, EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: beds are high.unable to get in without a huge hop. this solved problem. just gentle step into bed.Easy to move, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: ddarlenesv

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The stool is perfect for entering/exiting my Toyota RAV 4 after Neurosurgery from the T-2 S-1 for Kyphoscoliosis. I left a hospital rehab to return home I needed assistance into the car seat{per PT specialist], without breaking a 90 degree angle. this stool did the trick,easy to carry, lift and store.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU FOR HELPING SENIORS
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior now. I am sure this wonderful product has prevented injury....6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Carey Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for potty training toddler
customer_reviews.text: This stool is exactly what I was looking for! perfect height to reach standard toilet and standard sink for my 2yo. i love the grip on top and bottom so it doesn't slip on floor and child doesn't slip while standing. want to buy more for every bathroom in the house!
customer_reviews.author: KPIrish

customer_reviews.title: Great step stool!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this step stool for two years or so, and I love it. I love that it's nice and basic and neutral, not a frog or bright teal or musical or sparkly. I love the treads that keep my kids from slipping. I love how stable it is when you stand on it--no tipping over or scooting, thanks to the treads on the bottom and the wide base. It's not too tall, so I'm comfortable with my younger kids using it. It's easy for potty training kids to pick up and move between the potty and the sink as they need to, and they like to sit on it while we brush teeth. All for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and doesn’t move due to the rubber on the bottom and it’s top is rubber as well.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong!
customer_reviews.text: This stool is great! It is very light but very strong!
customer_reviews.author: Sybilsadie

customer_reviews.title: Functional & Low Key
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for youngsters to reach sink while non-bright colors keep the restroom age neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Z.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Mom is 80 And needed a little lift for reaches in the kitchen. Just perfect !
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: A great, sturdy step stool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great step stool for me to use in the kitchen for those items on the top cupboard shelf, etc. It holds my big and tall hubby too, I seem to need it more. Good and sturdy but easy to carry around to where it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Creech

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The step stool is the perfect height for me to use in our kitchen! Looks nice too. I wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. It's also very resistant to slipping and feels very sturdy. Small enough to stow away fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Negron

customer_reviews.title: It needs to be bigger so kids can climb up and turn around better.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay, no-slip step stool. I use this at my daycare. Not as big as I thought. It needs to be bigger so kids can climb up and turn around better.
customer_reviews.author: TLMom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice step, does not slide and is sturdy and light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice step, does not slide and is sturdy and light
customer_reviews.author: CoconutGrover

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This step stool is fantastic! I was looking for something for my grandson that was very sturdy. He had stepped on it in the middle, on each end and on only one end and it has never once tipped. The rubber on the bottom really keeps it steady. It doesn't look like a child's stool so this 5'1" Mimi can have it out without feeling like a child. Highly recommend this stool.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT THE KIDS NEEDED!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandkids who are here 3-4 times a week and it was a very good buy. Three are too small to wash their hands without being lifted up so this solved that problem and saved me back. Made of durable plastic with a non-skid top and very sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Catellier

customer_reviews.title: Durability.
customer_reviews.text: My W wife is short and she uses to reach in the upper shelves of the kitchen cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: bob jordan

customer_reviews.title: EWorjs great
customer_reviews.text: Great for me to get in and out of bed without falling. needed the extra height in order to safely get into bed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Great little stool
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stool for me. I am very short and have trouble stepping up onto higher step stools. If I need a higher stool, I can use this to step up onto the higher stool. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and design is on point
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and design is on point. I use it as a laundry step stool & it goes well with our contemporary design laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: anna kristina gonzales abad

customer_reviews.title: Need larger base.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are big and use this to get into bath tub so base could be a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 2yo to reach the sink
customer_reviews.text: Solid stool for an otherwise slippery tile floor in the bathroom. our 2yo is able to stand on it to wash her hands and brush her teeth (but not reach the faucet handle...thankfully).
customer_reviews.author: Ray Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Great little step stool for children and adults
customer_reviews.text: Can't ask for more: The step stool is sturdy, but small and lightweight enough for a toddler to move into place. And yet strong enough for a adult to use to reach an upper cabinet, or change a lightbulb!
customer_reviews.author: bibi

customer_reviews.title: Another great find in Joovy
customer_reviews.text: We had the Joovy potty and loved how sturdy and simple it was. When it came time for a stool for in front of his sink we went with the Joovy brand again. This stool is strong, sturdy, and has a non-slip grip on the bottom-- which was suprisingly difficult to find. I strongly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Blipoo

customer_reviews.title: Stable but too short
customer_reviews.text: This is the shortest stool I've ever seen. It thought it would be double the height so it's not all that effective.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for my son to use on the toilet which is what we bought it for and all we use it for at this time. It's sturdy and won't topple even when used by a scrambling 3 year old!
customer_reviews.author: F1 Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height and I feel totally safe and stable on it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for toddlers and adults
customer_reviews.text: Unlike toddler stools I've purchased in the past, this one doesn't collapse under my 140 lb weight. In fact, it has a much higher weight capacity so it is functional for both children and adults. It is very sturdy and doesn't tip or topple easily.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Reiffsteck

customer_reviews.title: Many safety features
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Sturdy. Does not slip on the floor. Nice treads on the top so your child has safe footing while on the step stool. Small profile. Attractive. It could be useful even when a child has outgrown it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy stool for a little one
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy stool for a little one! Nice grip, won't slide on the floor! We had no issues with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna P.

customer_reviews.title: Good height. Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Good height. Light weight, but not at all tipsy. Top keeps children from slipping even with their shoes on. And they little kids can pick it up and move it themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but rather small!
customer_reviews.text: This stool is very solid but on the small side. I think in hindsight I would get the other brand that wraps around the toilet base. It would make getting down easier for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: nelle niggle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We use this stool at the urinals in a church bathroom for little children. Easy to clean. Stable and slip resistant on a tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: I should have whipped out my tape measurer when I was reading the height of this step stool. I would have liked something higher, but what the heck, it does the trick I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: I have bought three!
customer_reviews.text: I love this step stool, it’s a perfect height to just be a little taller while in the kitchen. Very non-slip
customer_reviews.author: Terry McGlone

customer_reviews.title: stable stool gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective design. It is light weight, sturdy, and stable. Just what we needed to help the three year be able to access the bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great step stool.
customer_reviews.text: Very stable. Good height. So much better quality than other step stools around the same price. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SDEB

customer_reviews.title: Stable!
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy and stable! I'm glad I bought these. They still last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Super great stool
customer_reviews.text: very helpful for kids to get up to the sink. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Reimschiissel

customer_reviews.title: Nice stoop
customer_reviews.text: Feels very sturdy. Wide enough to move around whith reaching and grabbing
customer_reviews.author: Judith Sayad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy step stool
customer_reviews.text: This step stool is solid and sure footed. It is perfect for reaching those upper shelves in my closet. I heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very safe!
customer_reviews.text: Well designed step stool. Won't tip over. Wide area to place your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Toni P.

customer_reviews.title: nice little stool - holds way over 300lb
customer_reviews.text: Did not think it would hold up as it did not look quite sturdy in the images. but it is a great little booster
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my boat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Grandpa, so I use it primarily to step into and out of my pontoon boat. It doesn't slip or move when using it and is a perfect height to get to the things just out of reach, like my bimini top. Great construction and it's very durable ... the StepTool stays on the boat and the boat stays in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my grandson needed to reach the bathroom sink. Much stronger than the one I used to own.
customer_reviews.author: sday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great step stool for our grandson who is getting potty trained

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stool for toddler to step on to reach sink.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stool for my toddler to get some height to wash her hands!

customer_reviews.title: Joovy Step Stool
customer_reviews.text: I love this simple, light, little step stool. It is just perfect.

customer_reviews.title: My two grandchildren love this stool
customer_reviews.text: My two grandchildren love this stool. It enables them to reach the kitchen sink in order to wash their hands! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: The step stool is very sturdy for my 2.5 year old daughter who uses it in the bathroom. We've been very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stable and just the right size for my toddler
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: best stool I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Got this stool for my two year old daughter. Stool is just the right size and it has gripping around the bottom edge and on top so no slips so far! Can withstand quite a bit of weight too so she will be able to use it for a while. I highly recommend this stool!
customer_reviews.author: cuteasabutton

customer_reviews.title: Step stool
customer_reviews.text: My little granddaughter loves this stool. Uses it to get on the potty and to get on to reach things on cabinet
customer_reviews.author: June E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler. Nice size base and does not tip. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stool!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy for my toddler to carry around. Nice non-slip surface to stand on and rubber bottom edge so stool doesn't scoot on the floor. Well made too. Very satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stepstool. Arrived filthy. I'm tempted to return it and order another one, hopefully clean.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fits under our sink and our 2yo can pull it out by himself! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jessica simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made and quality product. shipping was fast and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: light and easy to move around the house. perfect for those who are vertically challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie H

customer_reviews.title: Very stable! Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: Most toddler step stools aren't safe as they wobble (no child steps exactly in the center of a stool). This one is very safe, and myself and my significant other can also use it with no weight problems. Great for adults and the youngest of toddlers
customer_reviews.author: NLB all-access customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the height. Use it for a number of things. Holds my fan in place too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Roy

customer_reviews.title: Nice size step stool
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this step stool, being a bit wider than the Bjorn version. I think the extra width really helps my two year old to balance and find the stool with his feet when he is dismounting his bed. And, it's still small enough for him to carry on his own. I also love that it holds up to 300 lbs so that even my husband can sit on it when bathing him.
customer_reviews.author: City Mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This thing will not tip and looks perfect for our bathroom. Just what we needed. I highly recommend if you need a step stool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great step/foot stool
customer_reviews.text: Loved this step stool. I was looking for a good foot stool to put under my desk that wasn't too high and could be used as a step stool as well. This one is the perfect size. The finished edges make it safer compared to some of the other plastic step stools I've tried which have left me with nasty scrapes on my ankles from the raw edges. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cath K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My (just turned) 3 year old can get ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My (just turned) 3 year old can get the soap and get his hands in the water after using the bathroom just fine. The only thing I don't like is that it seems to slip a bit more than I thought it would on our vinyl tile. Otherwise a nice sturdy step that can support my weight as well if I am too lazy to grab a ladder and need a couple more inches of height.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Robbins

product_meta.title: Joovy StepTool, White
product_meta.description: The Joovy steptool combines cutting edge design and sturdiness to look great and perform even better. The steptool is great in all environments and makes reaching easier for you and your children. Whether using it to reach a kitchen counter, the bathroom sink, or the big potty, the steptool will step up to your needs. Our step stool's sturdy construction is rated to support 300 pounds and the non slip top and bottom ensures both safety and stability. The steptool's sleek and clean design will look great in any home plus its stackability makes storage and clean up simple. You'll want one in every room. Form and function finally meet with the Joovy steptool. The steptool is entirely bpa, pvc and phthalate free.
feature_bullets: Non slip rubber top and bottom ensures both safety and stability
Solid construction rated to support 300 pounds
Sleek and sturdy design is great for child and parent use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars206 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
